title: Gumby : a miner affair
brief_description: Gumby, the worlds favourite clayboy invites you to join him and his friends Pokey the Horse, Prickle the dinosaur, and Goo the Blue Mermaid as they share eight fabulous new adventures: Mirror-aculous recovery ; As the worm turns ; Lost treasure ; Beetle and the caterpillar ; A Miner affair ; All cooped up ; Wild girls ; A Smashing hit.
